text: William Ernesto Izarra Caldera (7 May 1947 â€“ 1 October 2021) was a Venezuelan diplomat, academic, writer, military official, and politician. He also worked as a professor for the Central University of Venezuela. He was a Senator between 1998 until 1999. He was also the Ambassador to North Korea from May 2021 until his death. Izarra was a member of the United Socialist Party. He was born in Maracay, Venezuela. Izarra died on 1 October 2021 at a hospital in Caracas, Venezuela from COVID-19 at the age of 74. ==References== Category:1947 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Caracas Category:Venezuelan politicians Category:Venezuelan writers Category:Ambassadors Category:Venezuelan diplomats Category:Venezuelan academics Category:Political writers Category:Socialist politicians
title: William Izarra
